vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀβαδδών (Heb. אֲבַדּוֹן, destruction; LXX, ἀπώλεια, only in Wisdom Lit., of the place of the ruined dead: Job.26:6, 28:22, 31:12, Psa.88:12, Pro.15:11*), indecl.;
in NT, Abaddon, the angel of the Abyss: Rev.9:11.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Abaddon, "destruction"
Abaddon, (Proper name), indecl, alternate spelling: Ἀββαδών, the angel who rules in hell, Rev. 9:11*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Abadón  Destructor (nombre hebreo de un demonio transliterado al griego)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞巴頓 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "毀滅"
地獄使者首領的名字 (啟 9:11)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚巴顿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "毁灭"
地狱使者首领的名字 (启 9:11)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-ba-đôn, nghĩa là chốn trầm luân hay là sự hủy diệt. A-ba-đôn trong nguyên văn, dịch là « mồ mả », « vực sâu », « nơi tối tăm » và « xứ bị bỏ » / âm phủ, địa ngục. H11
